Name: Jamaica
Motto:
Non sibi sed patriae
(Latin: "Not for oneself, but for one's country")
Nickname(s): 'The Fighting J', 'The Galloping Ghost of the North Korean Coast'
Displacement:
about 8,631 long tons (8,770 t) (standard load)
11,017 long tons (11,194 t) (deep load)
Propulsion:
4 Admiralty 3-drum boilers
4 shafts; 4 geared steam turbine sets
Range: 6,250 nmi (11,580 km; 7,190 mi) at 13 knots (24 km/h; 15 mph)
Armament:
4 × triple 6 in (152 mm) guns
4 × twin 4 in (102 mm) DP guns
2 × quadruple 2-pdr (40 mm (1.6 in)) AA guns
2 × triple 21 in (533 mm) torpedo tubes
Armour:
Engine and boiler rooms: 3.25 in (83 mm)
Decks: 2–3.5 in (51–89 mm)
Magazines: 2–3.5 in (51–89 mm)
Gun turrets: 1–2 in (25–51 mm)
